segments.text: No , no , a friend of mine taught me this really fun game . I ’ m going to describe someone ’ s face , and you guess who it is !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let ’ s see . He has a roman nose , bushy eyebrows and dimples !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our cousin Pete ! My turn ! She has a pointy nose , sunken eyes and a mole on her chin !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Aunt Rose ! That mole is so huge ! OK , my turn . He has a crooked nose and full lips . He has quite a few freckles and an oval face . Oh , he is also bald !
segments.speaker: S1
